DOC.brief_summary: ASA I-II 3-12 year old child participate study . All Participants divide three group . In Groups I , 2,5 mg/kg propofol 0,5 mg/kg ketamine apply anaesthesia induction . General anaesthesia perform 5/1 ratio ketamine-propofol mixture % 67 Mcfarlan dose regiment . In Groups II , 2,75 mg/kg propofol 0,41 mg/kg ketamine apply anaesthesia induction . General anaesthesia perform 6,7/1 ratio ketamine-propofol mixture % 80 Mcfarlan dose regiment . In Groups III , 3 mg/kg propofol 0,3 mg/kg ketamine apply anaesthesia induction . General anaesthesia perform 10/1 ratio ketamine-propofol mixture % 90 Mcfarlan dose regiment . After surgical operation recovery time , PAED score , FLACC score , Staying time PACU record . These data evaluate statistically .
DOC.detailed_description: ASA I-II , 3-12 year old child operate due tonsillectomy adenoidectomy . participate study . All Participants divide three group . In Groups I , 2,5 mg/kg propofol 0,5 mg/kg ketamine apply anaesthesia induction . General anaesthesia perform 5/1 ratio ketamine-propofol mixture % 67 Mcfarlan dose regiment . In Groups II , 2,75 mg/kg propofol 0,41 mg/kg ketamine apply anaesthesia induction . General anaesthesia perform 6,7/1 ratio ketamine-propofol mixture % 80 Mcfarlan dose regiment . In Groups III , 3 mg/kg propofol 0,3 mg/kg ketamine apply anaesthesia induction . General anaesthesia perform 10/1 ratio ketamine-propofol mixture % 90 Mcfarlan dose regiment . McFarlan dose regiment include 15 mg/kg/h infusion 15 minute , 13 mg/kg/h infusion second 15 minute , 11 mg/kg/h infusion 30 60 minute , 10 mg/kg/h 1 2 h. Anaesthesia dept detect BIS monitoring operation . After surgical operation recovery time , PAED score , FLACC score , stay time PACU extubation time record . At end study , data evaluate statistically .
DOC.criteria: ASA III child Children perform adenoidectomy tonsillectomy surgical operation ASA IIIIV child Patients age 13
